sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Post.css' import Comment from '../../img/comment.png' import Share from '../../img/share.png' import Heart from '../../img/like.png' import NotLike from '../../img/notlike.png' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' function Post({ data }) { const { user } = useSelector((state) => state.authReducer.authData) return (
{data.likes} likes
{data.name} {data.desc}
) } export default Post
